articles.title: Wipro Ltd. Invests in Cloud-Native Infrastructure
articles.summary: In a strategic move to enhance operational efficiency, Wipro Ltd. is migrating key business systems to cloud-native platforms. The transformation is expected to reduce costs and improve scalability.

articles.title: Wipro Ltd. Reports Strong Financial Performance
articles.summary: Wipro Ltd. has reported solid financial results for the quarter, with revenue growth driven by strong performance in core business areas. The company reaffirmed its commitment to investing in technology and innovation.

articles.title: Wipro Ltd. Announces Strategic Partnership to Expand Services
articles.summary: Wipro Ltd. has formed a strategic partnership aimed at expanding its service offerings and reaching new markets. The collaboration will leverage complementary strengths to deliver enhanced value to customers.
